description:
'tools/conf/generate_sample.sh' doesn't handle code as default value.  For example take:

nova/flags.py:

    cfg.StrOpt('host',
               default=socket.gethostname(),
               help='Name of this node.  This can be an opaque identifier.  '
                    'It is not necessarily a hostname, FQDN, or IP address.'),


In 'etc/nova/nova.conf.sample', this becomes
###### (StrOpt) Name of this node.  This can be an opaque identifier.  It is not necessarily a hostname, FQDN, or IP address.
# host="sorcha"
title: tools/conf/generate_sample.sh doesn't handle code as default value
